title: rspm: RStudio Package Manager — rspm-package
text: Enables binary package installations Linux distributions. Provides access RStudio's public repos, transparent management system requirements without administrative privileges. Currently supported distributions CentOS / RHEL 7 8, several RHEL derivatives (Rocky Linux 8, AlmaLinux 8, Oracle Linux 7 8, Amazon Linux 2), openSUSE / SLES 15.3, Ubuntu 18.04, 20.04 22.04.
